necessary

correctly & clean if

Maintenance
Checklist

Maintenance
Checklist

Figure 7

Figure 12

•  Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers,

Rubber Roller, and Punches & Packing Table.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new on e.

•
•  Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.
•  No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease and other lubricants.

•  Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers,

Rubber Roller, and Punches & Packing Table.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new on e.

•  Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.
•  No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease and other lubricants.

Teflon

Check & grease if
necessary also check
bearings with
Foodlube Universal 2
(NSF H1 – 121603)
Check & fasten loose
couples & check that
the wires don’t get in
front of moving parts.
Check to see if no
cracks in plates, wipe
with brown scotch
bright and replace
Teflon if necessary.
Check if Teflon is not
torn and that no poly
builds up is present
and replace if
necessary

•  Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers,

Rubber Roller, and Punches & Packing Table.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new on e.

•
•  Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.
•  No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease and other lubricants.

draw rollers and
ensure free of wear
and foreign objects.

rollers is that so no
contamination will
occur. Replace draw
rollers if necessary.

fittings/connections are
intact and free of any
leaks that pose
potential risk to
product. Replace with
new fitting if
necessary.

CROSS SEALS & COOLING UNIT

•  Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers,

Rubber Roller, and Punches & Packing Table.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new on e.

•
•  Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.
•  No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease and other lubricants.

finger over pad and

necessary

Cutting Blades

Packing Table

Conveyor Belt

-

-

-

Check the condition of
table and ensure free
of wood chips, pieces
of fragmented plastic
and other foreign
objects. Ensure
condition of table is
that so no
contamination will
occur. Repair surface if
any damage to
surface.
Check the condition of
belt and ensure free of
fray. Ensure condition
of belt is that so no
contamination will
occur. Trim with cutter
knife if any signs of
wear.

If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new on e.

•
•  Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.
•  No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease and other lubricants.

Controlled Copy

•  Please ensure that the Blue cloth is always used for food contact surfaces when wiping down for post maintenance cleaning i.e. Aluminium Rollers,

Rubber Roller, and Punches & Packing Table.
If the Blue Cloth does get contaminated with grease and/or other lubricants, please discard of immediately and issue a new on e.

•
•  Ensure that frames of machines, rails where excess grease may be, must be wiped down with a rag. This rag cannot be used for any food contact surfaces.
•  No Blue Cloths to be used for wiping of grease and other lubricants.
